keyMappings:
unmapAll

" Hint operations
map f  LinkHints.activateMode
map F  LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map mf LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map gf LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
" map gf LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map gd LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map I  LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map q  LinkHints.activateMode action=hover
map Q  LinkHints.activateMode action=mouseout

" Search
map /  enterFindMode
map n  performFind
map N  performBackwardsFind

" Visual mode, Caret mode and Copying
map v  enterVisualMode
map V  enterVisualLineMode
map yy copyCurrentUrl
map yf LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl

" Movement
map h  scrollLeft
map j  scrollDown
map gg scrollToTop
map l  scrollRight
map d  scrollPageDown
map e  scrollPageUp
map u  scrollPageUp
" map d  scrollFullPageDown
" map e  scrollFullPageUp
" map u  scrollFullPageUp
map G  scrollToBottom
map k  scrollUp

" Tab management
map H  previousTab
map L  nextTab
map g0 firstTab
map g$ lastTab
map U  lastTab
map D  firstTab
map r  reload
map R  reload hard
map gH  goBack
map <backspace>  goBack
map gL  goForward
map <s-backspace>  goForward
map x  removeTab
map X  restoreTab
map c  removeTab
map C  restoreTab
map t  Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map w  moveTabToNewWindow
map mm Marks.activateCreateMode
map gm Marks.activateGotoMode
map <  moveTabLeft
map >  moveTabRight

" Deactivate shorcuts
map i  enterInsertMode

" Vomnibar
map b  Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map B  Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map T  Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map o  Vomnibar.activate
map O Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map :  Vomnibar.activate
map ,  Vomnibar.activateEditUrl

" Miscellaneous
map gi focusInput
map g- goToRoot
" map gf nextFrame
map gF mainFrame
map M  toggleMuteTab
map P  togglePinTab
map <f1> createTab chrome-extension://dbepggeogbaibhgnhhndojpepiihcmeb/pages/options.html

map ?  showHelp

map A  Vomnibar.activate keyword=obk
searchEngines:
w: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia
we: https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia ES
p: https://piped.kavin.rocks/results?search_query=%s Piped
